FileRename.description: Represents information on a file/folder rename.

newUri.description: A file:// URI for the new location of the file/folder being renamed.

oldUri.description: A file:// URI for the original location of the file/folder being renamed.

description: The parameters sent in file rename requests/notifications.

files.description:
An array of all files/folders renamed in this operation. When a folder is renamed, only
the folder will be included, and not its children.
